adminQuestions.question: You have 10 candles. You blow out 3. How many candles remain after 5hours?
What's the name of this event ?
A plane crashes exactly on the border between India and Nepal. Where do they bury the survivors?
Which is bigger?
A boy is in a car accident. The father dies. At the hospital, the surgeon says, “I can’t operate. He’s my son.”

A man lives on the 10th floor.
Every day he takes the lift down to go to work.
When he returns, he takes the lift to the 7th floor and walks the rest — except on rainy days, when he goes all the way to the 10th floor.

A woman shoots her husband.
Then she holds him underwater for 5 minutes.
Finally, she hangs him.
After that, they both go out for dinner.

I speak without a mouth and hear without ears.
I have no body, but I come alive with wind.

You see a boat filled with people.
It has not sunk.
But when you look again, you don’t see a single person on the boat.

A small lotus plant is floating in a pond.  Every day, the number of lotus leaves doubles in size.  If it takes 30 days for the pond to become completely covered with lotus leaves...On which day was the pond half covered?

Two trains are 100 km apart, moving toward each other.
Each train travels at 50 km/h.

A bird starts at one train and flies toward the other at 100 km/h.
When it reaches the second train, it instantly turns back.
It keeps flying back and forth until the trains collide.

How far did the bird fly?

A father says:
“When I was your age, I was 30.”
The son replies:
“When I am your age, I will be 30.”

How old are they now?

A hotel has infinitely many rooms.
All rooms are full.

A new guest arrives.

Can the hotel still accommodate him?

You are given:

2 Red capsules

2 Blue capsules

You must swallow exactly 2 capsules at the same time.

Condition:

You will survive only if you take 1 Red and 1 Blue together.

If you take 2 Reds → you die.

If you take 2 Blues → you die.

You cannot tell which capsule is which from the outside.


How can you guarantee survival?

You are standing outside a closed room.

Outside the room there are 3 switches.

Inside the room there is only 1 light bulb.

Only one switch controls the bulb. The other two do nothing.

Rules:

You can turn the switches on and off as much as you want.

You may enter the room only once.

Once you enter, you cannot touch the switches again.

How do you figure out which switch controls the bulb?

You have two ropes.
Each rope takes exactly 1 hour to burn.
But they burn at uneven speeds (not uniformly).

You also have a lighter.

How do you measure exactly 45 minutes?

You have 8 identical-looking coins.
One coin is slightly heavier.

You have a balance scale.
You may weigh coins only two times.

How do you find the heavier coin?

Four people must cross a bridge at night.They have one flashlight.The bridge holds only two people at a time.Speeds:Person A: 1 min Person B: 2 min Person C: 7 min Person D: 10 min When two cross, they move at the slower person’s speed. What is the fastest time they can all cross?

You are in a sealed room.
No doors.
No windows.
Concrete walls.

Inside you have:

A mirror

A wooden table

How do you escape?
